C

call() - Method in class com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core.StateTransitionLatch
Implements the latching logic, namely waiting until one of the following conditions is fulfilled: We reach the desired state We reach the error state (optional) We are cancelled We return the current state at the end of the run if and only if we find a desired state.
cancel(boolean) - Method in class com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.event.EventRequest
Cancels the event if still pending, returning true if cancellation is successful.
